originalText.text: The social media pages are boldly highlighting familiar members, and although I did fall in love with the church, people need a lot of work dealing with the community and staying involved. I saw 20+ on a choir, 7 involved in rehearsals. Free dance classes for the youth, but less than 2 performances a year If any. Rock Church Manhattan will do better, in time.

originalText.text: This is not about bashing a church, but Warning of church structure as a whole (UNHEALTHY). CONTROLLED BY APOSTASY & HERESY.  Teachings of(Doctrinal ERROR), The Rock Adapted Cesar Castellano Theology & Doctrine. Which is A CULTIC DISCIPLESHIP strategy, its supposed to make every believer a leader (modeled after the 12 Apostles). Saints Beware, They RECRUIT Disciple= Groom. The rock, You're to have life with your Cell group in order to recieve a Spiritual Cover'n". Make "COVENANT" w/ them complete faithfulness to church vision/discipleship & idolize leadership, this covenant goes before marriages, family, & children!  Like The Heavy Shepard Movement: You're assigned a Leader, that Leader becomes your spiritual guide, and you're "accountable to them". CULT like submission to pastoral Authority. You're expected to "Recruit" daily, give REPORTS of your work (EVANGELISM). How many souls you "Saved", Internationally, Locally, and how many Lighthouses you open. Everything in this church is BY WORKS! You're not free to teach any outside Christian books for cell group. Only books by them/Cluster series to produce more ways on how to effectively Recruit Ppl to the vision of (Governing of 12). Modeling after Cesar Castellanos vision. "The Key To Multiplication of 144, "Successful Leadership" to name few.The Rock church works endlessy on the streets, hotels, Walmart, for unbelievers to repeat "Prayer of Salvation" thru that confession, the Convert is saved/guarantee eternity before God's eyes, (Biblically Unsound) W/out the convert having to live a repented/transformed life. They abuse the verse Matthew 28:16. They don't preach on Repentance, Faith, and living a life in Purity, Yeilding to The Holy Spirit. They focus on "Claim it and grab it", Prosperity Gospel" Miracles, Signs,& Wonders", Evangelize & SERVE to get ur "12", if you want ur family saved, a job, or God to hear u.  Jesus will know u by ur fruit/ to them amount of ppl you're  recruiting into your Cell Group. Not producing spiritual fruit. They are about "Professing Christ" but no standard to live by God's word. Where "Ministry" is about going door To door, like salesman marketing their church by hand'n out flyers to invite, & count the ppl so they could follow up w/ after. This is there labor what they mean by "Faith WithOut Works Is Dead". They Continue the Same vision of G12, same preaching of Miracles,Signs,Wonder, Covenant, Anointed Service, Success, Claim it Grab it Blessings, Rahab covenant, every yr same repetitive outline in 17 yrs of this church. This Ministry keeps the ppl in BONDAGE. The liberty and freedom of Christ Jesus is not in this church. They DO NOT Ackw. ISREAL..Using parts of the bible to justify some things of Christ but half the truth is still a whole Lie. Its mainly more about your own interpretation of the word. Never in true context of scripture, ALWAYS Way Off! This "church" is the work of darkness, doing satan's bidding inviting many to the falling away from the faith. Mature in your walk/ read God's word for the sake of ur OWN SALVATION. Hold your pastors accountable to the word of God like in Acts 17:11!? We're asked to test (Judge) the spirit for a reason (1 John 4:1).  The Holy Spirit leads us into all truth (John 16:12-15). This ministry wants you dependant on them.  Praying the veil comes off #SeekTruth. I left this church because y'all are the epitome of Matthew 7:20-23.

originalText.text: My life and outlook on life has changed tremendously. Never been happier and love everyone like family and they love me back the same!!! Thank you Jesus!!!
